GridLayout.StackLayout:

width="20" height="20" borderRadius="10" text="{{ firstProductList[0].productItems[0]._quantity <= 99 ? firstProductList[0].productItems[0]._quantity : '99+' }}" style="vertical-align: middle" fontSize="8" color="white" />
